"The divide is still there...Cash is still king...when we speak about bridging the cash and digital divide it's about looking at the customer and appreciate the friction points that they have in their transactional lives." -Jury   #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica
Dr Graham Bright, Euro-Exim wants to know "when was the last time you used cash?"  #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica  https://t.co/QGe2LPD8XF
"When was the last time you used cash?" Dr Bright asks fellow panellists.  #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica

#LIVENOW Join our moderator as she chats to our panellists about The Changing Face of Banking: Cash, Mobile Money, Digital Payment Adoption. #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica  https://t.co/XFtdHItWvL

"Digitization is a very broad topic...if you specifically look at the impact of the financial services...We are bringing financial services to the millions of Africans that have been deprived. We tracking cash to the bottom the pyramid." -Kumar  #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking
"We see digitization categorised as a big step...digitization goes hand in hand with formal financial inclusion..." Andy Jury, CEO, Mukuru #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica
"The expectations of business users are so much higher...you need to really tap into a lovable and delightful experience of the customer." -Kelly Parkhurst #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica

"What we are attempting to do is getting standardization across a digital flow so we can speed up the process so we can allow payments to happen in a seamless way." -Dr Bright #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica

"We are seeing a requirement to digitise those payments...the ability is there however our infatruture...there are many ecosystems in trade."Dr Graham Bright, Euro-Exim #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica
"I feel banking will always be here to stay but banks is a different story. I don't think you need banks to do banking." -Kumar #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica

"I really see a future that is different at least for Africa...a number of countries in Africa perhaps have more mobile phones than they do light bulbs." -Kumar #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking  #BankingInAfrica

"There is a revolutionary change that is happening that some of us don't see as closely... the digital revolution needs to move differently...we need to make sure that no citizen is left behind." Vimal Kumar, CEO, Airtel Money, Airtel Africa Operations #FOB2021 #FutureOfBanking

"The dream of connected care...I have really seen government and private institutions much more receptive to this kind of solution. They still want cutting edge technology but they understand that  there is value in this kind of solution." -Ventricelli @PhilipsSAfrica

"To create the right system we are focusing on collaboration, partnership and co-creation with our key partner systems in the ecosystem," -Ventricelli on value-based care #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME @PhilipsSAfrica

"A patient in ICU can be prioritized based off of this...This will really put the patient at the centre of the care" -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME @PhilipsSAfrica

"In a network of hospitals and beyond, the big number that this information can be benchmarked and it will really help because it will tell us about a case and what is happening with the patient..." #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME @PhilipsSAfrica

"Many governments are coming with data privacy laws which is important because many patients and in healthcare, they want to protect sensitive data and information," -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME @PhilipsSAfrica

"The challenges that I see are beyond Africa...there needs to a development proper infrastructure... healthcare is quite a complex environment," -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME @PhilipsSAfrica

"Healthcare is sill a fragmented system...but this new development of digital technology we can customizes the approach for chronic patients which will look at customizes treatment plans," -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME  @PhilipsSAfrica
"Improving staff experience is another challenge in the healthcare system," -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FOHSUMMIT #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME  @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "I travelled to Africa and I found that in some parts of the healthcare system both in private and public, they are very sensitive to these changes that are happening,"  -Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FOHSUMMIT #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME  @PhilipsSAfrica  https://t.co/x5S7fao8CR

#LIVE  "I think patients, healthcare and physicians saw how technology can quickly link people...Where specialists can access vital patient data regardless of location."- Ventricelli #FutureHealth #FOHSUMMIT #FutureHealthIndex  @cnbcafrica @PhilipsME  @PhilipsSAfrica

"Then having the data of visualization which is really exciting for the patient," -@Zwiers #FutureHealth #FOHSUMMIT #FutureHealthIndex  @PhilipsSAfrica @cnbcafrica  https://t.co/ofcoueFKhA

#LIVE  "I think the bottom line is patients owning their own data and diagnostics and that will allow people to have a better understanding of who they are," -@Zwiers  #FutureHealth #FOHSUMMIT #FutureHealthIndex @cnbcafrica @PhilipsSAfrica  https://t.co/wUU9aJeKGC

"Today many things can be done from your mobile phone," -Numanoglu  @RCWMCH  @WOFAPS @WesternCapeGov #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "What I am delighted about is a number of these technologies are developed in house regionally,"--Numanoglu  @RCWMCH  @WOFAPS @WesternCapeGov #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
"The biggest challenge is when your numbers are so high how do you allocate resources,"-Numanoglu  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
"There are patients we had to reduce some services to because we had to shift the focus onto Covid," -Numanoglu #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE "The impact of covid has been very significant and working in pediatric hospital we have definitely felt it,"- Numanoglu #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

"This question of digitization starts with data...you need data to be able to build some of these platforms...to start off with need to fix data to be able to learn from other sectors," -@LeniasHwenda  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

"We really are seeing government step and recalibrating  which give Africans a share the market which they been historically denied,"-@LeniasHwenda  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
"I think going back to basics is important...the digitisation of data- we still see an over-reliance of paper." - @LeniasHwenda  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

"One of the things the pandemic showed us private sector is just as reliant as everyone on else. Viruses populate everywhere...we need to look at the population in totality and what those solutions look like," -@Zwiers #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE  "Evolving business models and we see how many businesses are evolving their business models," -@Zwiers  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex  @PhilipsSAfrica

"There is no time like present," -Gordon  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex  @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "Covid has shown the failures of the systems...and I think the world has woke up and I think we finally have a golden opportunity to take things into our own hands,"-Gordon #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE  "I do think the impact of mental health is underestimated...mental health is going to be more funded in Africa," -Gordon #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

"It's unfair to expect private sector partnership where funding is an issue or there isn't sustainability vs the public sector where the need is greater..." -Gordon #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex  @PhilipsSAfrica
"The key question is sustainability...Digital health is a very important conversation where funders need to come together," -Gordon  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica
"Business tech is definitely going to be a driver in Africa and link that with artificial intelligence,"-Gordon #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "There is a little bit of a shift but from a South African perspective, maybe not enough," -@ChoonaraShakira  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "There is great promise in digital in health worker training...In places where the internet may not be that great-community health workers are trained by SMS technology," @ChoonaraShakira  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

Dr Harsha Somaroo: "One thing that has happened in this pandemic is a lot of new usage of technology...but not all of it has been successful...Implementation of systems shows promise."  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE  "Besides the availability but people on the continent have always been suspicious of western medicine,"- @ChoonaraShakira  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "Close to 50% of the African continent are vaccine-hesitant and a lot of it is young people...one of the reasons could be because misinformation came in so quickly,"- @ChoonaraShakira  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE "Under the POPIA there are restrictions to what you can process...POPIA when you are transferring health information across borders you need to take note of the fact that there is a lot of red tape," -Mather  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth @PhilipsSAfrica

"The vaccine was really prioritized to those who were more vulnerable...and I do think this was the best approach. But if we had a general divide we would have seen young people protesting this," -Somaroo #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE "I think we have generational differences, I really hope at this point we can define it as a generational divide."  -Somaroo #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "We are not a stage to be pushing for booster shots...The divide is quite a big one. 1 out of 10 health workers in Africa are being vaccinated vs other countries where it is 1 out of 4,"  @ChoonaraShakira speaks on vaccine equity  #FOHSUMMIT @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "We have this new protection of information act, that came in the midst of Covid-19, that both affected public and private health officials," -Nadine Mather - Senior Associate, Bowmans #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

Crisp states that in about the next 3-5 years the first phase of integrating the public and private sector is on the agenda.  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021  @PhilipsSAfrica
"We have to prepare the public health services because they don't have the same billing mechanisms," -Crisp  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE "These are long reports but this is the long game...we would like to see the reform of the healthcare system happen first," -Crisp #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE "There is no reason why we can't collaborate with one another. We always have different starting blocks but we all have our patients best interests...I would like to see that formalize and structure these conversations," Crisp  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex
"We can afford to NHI as South Africa. We actually cannot afford to not do it," -Crisp #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

"It takes time to put these things in place. I would caution people to think that things will happen next year...we will only see baby steps happening next year,"- Crisp #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

"We don't see us needing more than the 8 and half % of GDP on healthcare," Nicholas Crisp, Deputy Director-General: National Health Insurance says in #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  Now in conversation Nicholas Crisp, Deputy Director-General: National Health Insurance explains the role of medical schemes in relation to the NHI.  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  "There are some provisions in the bill, and they are contested and from government's perspective medical schemes should only offer cover...we don't see us doing away with the medical schemes act,"-Crisp  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth @PhilipsSAfrica

#LIVE  Nicholas Crisp on NHI: "The ultimate concept is now we will have single-payer models...this will be the primary purchaser...we are looking to address the imbalance...we don't want to see South Africans paying out of pocket for health care."  #FOHSUMMIT @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE  "Many of the people who have access to medical schemes sometimes don't even know what their medical schemes even cover." -Crisp  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex2021 @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE "The challenges [with NHI] is our legislation has been stuck in parliament for a while now because of Covid," #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @PhilipsSAfrica
#LIVE "There are a huge amount of challenges... but the way we have been using digital technology is very encouraging," -Crisp  #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 021 @philipssa

#LIVE  FIRESIDE CHAT WITH NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE @FifiPeters is now in conversation with Nicholas Crisp, Deputy Director-General: National Health Insurance #FOHSUMMIT #futurehealth #FutureHealthIndex 2021 @philipssa

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "Cash will never go away but everybody is starting to recognize the cost of cash like printing, storing transporting, tax. The cost of cash is about 1 1/2 of GDP of a country" Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We've seen a doubling of the rate of growth of ecommerce transactions. A lot of merchants are signing up for ecommerce." Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "Because of the level of digitization. Consumers in Africa are demanding for services that aren't here so we have to find a way to build them. From risk perspective there will need to be balance" @KenNjorogeCG, CEO @Cellulant @MastercardMEA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "The role of the @_AfricanUnion  to harmonise policy. The spirit for digitisation and trade is present. There is a big opportunity to pick best practice and create a coherent regulatory framework" @KenNjorogeCG, CEO @Cellulant @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/LnIHWJ5LGW

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "In Tanzania, we're working on a programme to allow farmers to digitally buy and sell their own crop. This data can lead to loans to micro farmers to buy fertilizers & seeds to grow their business." Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We need to find new ways and innovate to roll out capability. Digital transactions generate data which can be transformational" Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "Progress comes when everybody up and down the value chain; from regulator to the smallest fintech come together to transform the economic landscape and digitise transactions" Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA  https://t.co/BONl00dqWC

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "There are parts to accelerate digital growth. @Mastercard and M-pesa have created a great foundation at scale. That needs to be combined with a trust infrastructure like providing access to an ID system" @KenNjorogeCG, CEO @Cellulant @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/NmuzyCqu2X

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "There needs to be a solid business proposition for providers & high value offering for customers, like M-Pesa. We expect that customer habits will change despite a vaccine regarding trusting digital commerce." @AmoloNgweno CEO @BFAGlobal @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/sdKNDMthcF

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "The opportunity and challenge is so large we all need to collaborate. We have worked with government in Nigeria and Tanzania where we have launched digital payments " Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA:SSA  https://t.co/izRcUUjdib

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "There is a heavy drive to government digitisation and financial inclusion. There are now about 400 fintech companies across Africa. We are seeing startups innovating in this sector" @KenNjorogeCG, CEO @Cellulant @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/xleuvCF8P7
[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We have seen customer and transaction growth as well as a move towards a cashless society" @Sitoyo, Interim CEO at M-Pesa Africa @MastercardMEA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We are a purpose-led company. We want to transform lives and the services and products that we roll out are designed to make a difference. We are using technology for the betterment of the country" @Sitoyo, Interim CEO at M-Pesa Africa @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/G6AWfQaDIy

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "Collaboration and partnership in the financial sector is important to delivering mobile money" @Sitoyo, Interim CEO at M-Pesa Africa @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/hUGIWgHyaw
[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We have been at the forefront of financial inclusion. We aim to broaden access to financial services" @Sitoyo, Interim CEO at M-Pesa Africa @MastercardMEA
[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "There is a big task tp bring the  youth into the digital economy" @AmoloNgweno CEO @BFAGlobal @MastercardMEA

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We lack the products and business models, regional integration and the full tools needed to accelerate the digital revolution in small sectors" @AmoloNgweno CEO @BFAGlobal @MastercardMEA  https://t.co/OhDtIbnmaI

[LIVE] #DigiFinRoundTable: "We want to get a billion people into the digital economy by 2025. Digital is the only way to keep the financial economy going for individuals and both big and small business" Raghav Prasad, Division President, @MastercardMEA: SSA  https://t.co/8APNDExxH1

[ON AIR] #FOHSummit: "A good hospital manager must listen to the ideas and proposals from junior staff as they introduce new technologies" Dr. Paul Ciapparelli, COO of Clinical Services at Tygerberg Hospital @PhilipsSAfrica #futurehealth

[ON AIR] #FOHSummit: "The challenge is in implementing existing policies. There also needs to be a stronger push on outcomes and value-based medicine. The system needs to be remodeled" Dr. @terrencekommal, Medical Expert @PhilipsSAfrica #futurehealth  https://t.co/4MFLTKB3do

[ON AIR] #FOHSummit: "Improving healthcare'll be multifactorial involving everyone in the system.
